DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD15 WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME IN (SELECT PRPTYGROUPNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD02 WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME#)
UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM03 SET PRPTY2VAL = #value# WHERE PRPTYGROUPNAME = 'TRAN_BLOCK' AND PRPTYNAME = #type#

SELECT MAIN.* FROM $schemaId$.$tableName$ MAIN , $schemaId$.TSEAIAD02 SUB WHERE MAIN.PRPTYGROUPNAME = SUB.PRPTYGROUPNAME
$key1$ = #param1#
ORDER BY 1
